title: FS: T206 Mordecai Brown SGC 80 Tolstoi, $1575 delivered!!
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Mordecai Brown SGC 80 Tolstoi, $1575 delivered!!
posts.post_content:
Remarkable card, strong corners for a 6, extremely clean back. Card also exhibits a very nice WST as well, which maybe kept the card from grading higher. This is a solid card for the grade. $2,000 delivered, or best reasonable offer, thanks.... Reduced to $1800,...Final reduction, $1575....

[URL=http://s1122.photobucket.com/user/sean11251/media/img234_zps189498ed.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l540/sean11251/img234_zps189498ed.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

[URL=http://s1122.photobucket.com/user/sean11251/media/img235_zpsb66d3ab1.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l540/sean11251/img235_zpsb66d3ab1.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
Price reduced to $1800 delivered. Thanks for looking....

Nice card, Kevin.  Wish I had the funds to take this off your hands.

Best of luck with the sale.

Kevin,

Very nice '6' - one of the stronger ones I've seen.

Best of luck in the sale.

Scott

I've held the card in my hand... I don't know what keeps it out of a slightly higher holder.
Awesome card of a great HOFer, very nice Kevin!
$1675 delivered with insurance gets it, fabulous card.....
Would consider close offers, or cash and trade proposals, thanks...
